text: Would you like to host material to download and organize class-material per day?
Do you use video chat in your class?
Should the video sessions be recorded?
Would you like to use voice chat in your class?
Do you want a text chat in your class?
Would you prefer cloud computing services so you can work on one file with your students?
Are you working with a specific budget for the e-learning tool?
Do you need a scalable solution that can host more than 100 participants?
Is there a need for an in-built e-mail messaging system?
Should the plattform also be available as a mobile App?
Should it be classical teaching or the students be able to collaborate with each other?
